actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain high displacement industrial diesel engines and turbochargers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on: (1) four-cycle compression ignition engines having more than 671 kilowatts and a displacement of 35 liters or greater, not principally used in motor vehicles; and (2) turbochargers and parts for compression ignition diesel engines which are not used with passenger car engines.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain high displacement industrial diesel engines and turbochargers.
